# Milano Sensual Congress 2026

The official knowledge base for the Milano Sensual Congress 2026 website.

## Quick Links
- **Full Documentation**: [llms-full.txt](llms-full.txt) - Comprehensive site structure and content details.
- **English Site**: https://milanosensualcongress.com/
- **Italian Site**: https://milanosensualcongress.com/it/

## Event Summary
- **Name**: Milano Sensual Congress 2026
- **Dates**: November 20-22, 2026
- **Location**: Devero Hotel & Spa, Cavenago di Brianza (MB), Italy
- **Focus**: Bachata Sensual, International Artists, Workshops, Social Parties
- **Official Hashtags**: #MSC2026 #MilanoSensualCongress
